A '''mossy stone brick wall''' is a [[mossy stone brick]] variant of a [[wall]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Mossy stone brick walls can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{Breaking row|Mossy Stone Brick Wall|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
Mossy stone brick walls may generate in [[ruined portal]]s in the [[Overworld]].

== Usage ==
{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all walls|Wall#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Mossy stone brick walls can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
